Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Childbearing \Child"bear`ing\, n. The act of producing or bringing forth children; parturition. --Milton. Addison. [1913 Webster]

childbearing adj : relating to or suitable for childbirth; "of childbearing age" n : the parturition process in human beings; having a baby; the process of giving birth to a child [syn: {childbirth}, {accouchement}, {vaginal birth}]
